summary: Simple face edit for Lydia, making her more feminine, but not changing her drastically.
descriptionHtml:
I know, I know, so many Lydia mods...
Most Lydia mods that actually look good to me have drastically altered her AI as well, and I didn\'t really feel that was necessary, especially if you\'re using AFT, so this is just a simple face edit.
That said, she should be compatible with any mods that only edit her AI.

Feel free to let me know, or post a comment, if you have any issues with her.

She only requires a few mods to look like the screenshots:
Coverwomen - I would guess that any cosmetics mod would mostly do the trick, but this is the one I used.
(Look 1, but others will look similar. Don\'t forget the Neck Seam Fix, if applicable, while you\'re there.)
( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563//? )
The Eyes of Beauty
( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/? )

To uninstall, delete the following files:
Data\\CJTLydia.esp
\\Data\\Meshes\\Actors\\Character\\facegendata\\FaceGeom\\Skyrim.esm\\000A2C8E.NIF
\\Data\\Textures\\Actors\\Character\\FaceGenData\\facetint\\Skyrim.esm\\000A2C8E.dds
author: cjthibs
